event_registry_properties.name: action
event_registry_properties.item: Schedule a repair action to replace IOU#0.
event_registry_properties.name: description
event_registry_properties.item: The IOU#0 is missing or could not be detected during powerup.
event_registry_properties.name: details
event_registry_properties.item:
IOU#0 is missing or could not be detected during powerup.
The entire platform will not be powered up. The platform becomes unbootable.
The recommended service action for this event is to schedule the replacement of IOU#0.
Step 1. Collect the Fault Message (two methods)
Single-line fault message displayed on the XSCF console:
Dec 12 12:22:00 san-ff2-16-0 fmd: SOURCE: sde, REV: 1.15, CSN: BE80601000 EVENT-ID: 162ddd31-d7bf-4a9b-be7d-a19052736d77 Refer to http://www.sun.com/msg/SCF-8008-EG for detailed information.
Complete fault message using 'fmdump -m' on the XSCF console:
MSG-ID: SCF-8008-EG, TYPE: upset, VER: 1, SEVERITY: Critical EVENT-TIME: Wed Dec 12 12:22:00 PST 2007 PLATFORM: SPARC Enterprise M5000, CSN: BE80601000, HOSTNAME: san-ff2-16-0 SOURCE: sde, REV: 1.15 EVENT-ID: 162ddd31-d7bf-4a9b-be7d-a19052736d77 DESC: The IOU#0 is missing or could not be detected during powerup. Refer to http://www.sun.com/msg/SCF-8008-EG for more information. AUTO-RESPONSE: The entire platform will not be powered up. The platform becomes unbootable. Please consult the detail section of the knowledge article for additional information. IMPACT: The entire platform will not be powered up. The platform becomes unbootable. Please consult the detail section of the knowledge article for additional information. REC-ACTION: Schedule a repair action to replace IOU#0.
Step 2. Collect the output from the 'fmdump -v -u Event-ID' command
SPARC Enterprise platform example:
xscf> fmdump -v -u 162ddd31-d7bf-4a9b-be7d-a19052736d77
TIME UUID MSG-ID Dec 12 12:22:00.3207 162ddd31-d7bf-4a9b-be7d-a19052736d77 SCF-8008-EG 100% upset.chassis.SPARC-Enterprise.config.iou
Problem in: hc:///chassis=0 Affects: - FRU: hc://:product-id=SPARC Enterprise M5000:chassis-id=BE80601000: server-id=san-ff2-16-0/component=CHASSIS Location: CHASSIS
Step 3. Contact your Authorized Service Provider.
event_registry_properties.name: impact
event_registry_properties.item: The entire platform will not be powered up and the platform becomes unbootable. Please consult the detail section of the knowledge article for additional information.
event_registry_properties.name: response
title
event_registry_properties.item: IOU#0 is missing or could not be detected.
